title: Unfair account bans
body: I'm sick of watching myself and friends get bans due to "Toxic" behavior while every other game there are inters and people who afk who receive no punishment. Let poor sports be poor sports or maybe give out a warning instead of the warning already being a two week ban. please fix the system and punish those who actually ruin games not those who may "hurt" your feewings because your 1/6/2 in a ranked game.
